alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Seward; Thurston (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 2:01PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER WATCH CONVERTED TO WINTER WEATHER WARNING AND WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Butler, Colfax, Cuming, Thurston, and Seward Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
